title: Вызов
overview: "Vyzov" is a sports and intellectual game in which 11 stars of show business and 11 young stars from the world of science compete for the main prize of 10 million rubles. The location of the project in the second season will be the unpredictable and fascinating Dagestan. The project participants will undergo difficult tests of strength, dexterity, wit and intelligence, and will also learn to understand each other, because you can only reach the end together, leaving personal ambitions and statuses behind.According to the rules of the project, stars from the world of science are combined with the stars of show business, dividing them into pairs. Together, they need to go through difficult tasks to test the physical fitness of the participants and their ability to find a common language with a partner.
